'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.5]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-04-02 18:00:00 &mdash; 2024-4-23 14:59:00

===Summary===
* During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon {{Wish Item|Tome of the Eternal Flow}} and the 5-star weapon {{Wish Item|Freedom-Sworn}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|Wine and Song;Mitternachts Waltz}} as well as the 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|The Flute;Favonius Greatsword;Favonius Lance}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event wish, use [[Epitomized Path]] to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as {{Wish Item|Tome of the Eternal Flow}} or {{Wish Item|Freedom-Sworn}}. For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
